模块 SokobanGame
程序包 element

类 GameGrid

java.lang.Object
element.GameGrid
所有已实现的接口:
java.lang.Iterable<GameObject>
public class GameGrid
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<GameObject>
A class GameGrid represented the method of grid in game map. The methods about the grid of the map in the game are included in this class.
从以下版本开始:
1.0
作者:
Zhengtian CHU - modified

  • 嵌套类概要

    嵌套类
    修饰符和类型 类 说明
    class  GameGrid.GridIterator
    The class GridIterator represents the methods about the Iterator for the Grid

    构造器
    构造器 说明
    GameGrid​(int columns, int rows)
    Constructs and initialize a map of Sokoban with specified columns and specified rows

  • 构造器详细资料

    • GameGrid

      public GameGrid​(int columns, int rows)
      Constructs and initialize a map of Sokoban with specified columns and specified rows
      参数:
      columns - the columns of grids
      rows - the rows of grids

  • 方法详细资料

    • TranslatePoint

      public static java.awt.Point TranslatePoint​(java.awt.Point sourceLocation, java.awt.Point delta)
      Translate the point from sourceLocation for delta.
      参数:
      sourceLocation - the location of source point
      delta - the value of position variation
      返回:
      the point after translating.
      另请参阅:
      Point.translate(int, int)

    • GetDimension

      public java.awt.Dimension GetDimension()
      Returns the dimension of this dimension with the specified columns and the specified rows
      返回:
      a copy of this dimension
      另请参阅:
      Dimension()

    • GetGameObjectAt

      public GameObject GetGameObjectAt​(int col, int row) throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Get the game object in the specified position
      参数:
      col - the specified column
      row - the specified row
      返回:
      the GameObject on the specified position
      抛出:
      java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the position is outside the map
      另请参阅:
      GameEngine.IsDebugActive()

    • GetGameObjectAt

      public GameObject GetGameObjectAt​(java.awt.Point p)
      Get the game object in the specified position
      参数:
      p - the specified position
      返回:
      the GameObject in the specified position by GetGameObjectAt(int, int).
      抛出:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the point is null.

    • RemoveGameObjectAt

      public boolean RemoveGameObjectAt​(java.awt.Point position)
      Remove the object of specific position
      参数:
      position - the position of object
      返回:
      true if successfully remove the object; otherwise return false
      另请参阅:
      PutGameObjectAt(GameObject, Point)

    • PutGameObjectAt

      public boolean PutGameObjectAt​(GameObject gameObject, int x, int y)
      put the gameObject to the specified position, If the given position is out of the bounds of the map, will return false else return true.
      参数:
      gameObject - the object wants to put
      x - the object's column
      y - the object's row
      返回:
      true if the GameObject is successfully put; otherwise return false.
      另请参阅:
      isPointOutOfBounds(int, int)

    • PutGameObjectAt

      public boolean PutGameObjectAt​(GameObject gameObject, java.awt.Point p)
      put the gameObject to the specified position, If point is null, will return false else return true.
      参数:
      gameObject - the game object want to put
      p - the specified position
      返回:
      true if successfully put the object; otherwise return false

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 java.lang.Object

    • iterator

      public java.util.Iterator<GameObject> iterator()
      指定者:
      iterator 在接口中 java.lang.Iterable<GameObject>
